name: ByteRover Knowledge Audit
description: Audit knowledge freshness and coverage, identify stale entries and gaps, and provide remediation commands
long_description: A structured workflow for auditing the health of your ByteRover knowledge base. Cross-references documented knowledge against the current codebase to find stale entries, missing coverage, and knowledge drift. Produces a coverage report with prioritized, actionable brv curate commands to fix issues.
